## Versions

Version 1.0 was available as an internal report, does not have a permanent url/id.

Version 2.0 is available as an IUCN report [@GET_v2.0_2020].

Version 2.1 is available as supplementary material to the journal article [@Keith_2022_Ecosystem_Typology].

## Related resources

The WebApp is available at <https://global-ecosystems.org/>.

Multiple data and code repositories are consolidated in an [OSF project](https://osf.io/68syg/)  [@Ferrer-Paris_Typology_OSF_2023].

Additional webpages with [information about maps](https://jrfep.github.io/Ecosystem-profiles-comments/).
